_sText:
Here is my new map surf_Injection.

Special Thanks to:
  -Bravesurf/Swat/Helix
  -Billy
  -.Eric
  -K4bo
  -All Beta testers

______
______

How the system works:

The map is based on Teamplay.
So there are 6 pre-levels which must be done by every team. At the end of this pre-levels are always 2 Buttons. A red one (for Ts) and a blue one (for CTs). If you have done one level you have to push one of the buttons.
You only can press buttons for your team.

You can leave every Level without completing it if you get to the thing at the beginning of every level and let you absorb of it.

If all 6 pre-levels are done your team will get a hole in the floor of the spawn. This will teleport you to the last level. It only teleports your team. Not the other one.

If this last level is done you will get into a jail where you can choose out of 6 traps. 

If noone completes the map you will get into another jail where your team gets weapons: For every Level you and your mates have completet you will get better weapons. The Timer is set to 6 minutes.


There is also a BONUS level.
The system of Bonus is like one of the pre-levels: If your team made bonus and 5 of the other pre-levels you can get to the last level.
If all pre-levels and bonus are done you will get AWP in normal-jail.


And there is one secret in the map which wont be explained by me :p
______
______

I hope you understand what I wrote.
Have fun and enjoy playing my new map.

Exither


Here is a vid made by SG | Sh0k! showing how to surf the map:
